attributes.action: ... allow the non-resident parent (NRP) to pay child support by standing order
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Repeated requests to pay the CSA by Standing Order (S/O) fell on deaf ears. 

The CSA only permit two options:

1. Direct Debit (DD)

or

2. Deduction from Earnings Order (DEO).

Given their well-publicised incompetence, I think I should be allowed to pay by S/O. After all, it is my bank account. 

I consider that the CSA's refusal to accept a S/O payment is neither fair nor reasonable.
